definition: abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]

sentences.english: Southeast the Lovelorn Peacocks Fly is a famous long narrative poem in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 《孔雀東南飛》是一首膾炙人口的中國古代敘事長詩。

sentences.english: A unique narrative strategy is to narrative drama of a pioneering approach.
sentences.chinese: 全劇獨特的敘事策略是對電視劇敘事手法的一種開拓。

sentences.english: A unique narrative strategy is to narrative drama of a pioneering approach.
sentences.chinese: 全劇獨特的敘事策略是對電視劇敘事手法的一種開拓。

sentences.english: At the conclusion, the inflexion of the narrative perspective was supplemented.
sentences.chinese: 結語，補敘了嚴格的敘事角度分類之外的變音。

sentences.english: Modern News Narratology is the theoretical foundation of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 新興的新聞敘事學是本文的理論基礎。

sentences.english: This paper is an attempt to analyze the narrative style of Ling Shu-hua's fiction from the perspective of narratology.
sentences.chinese: 論文從敘事學的角度探討了凌叔華小說的敘事風格。

sentences.english: This paper is an attempt to analyze the narrative style of Ling Shu-hua's fiction from the perspective of narratology.
sentences.chinese: 論文從敘事學的角度探討了凌叔華小說的敘事風格。

sentences.english: Your imagery typically appears to be particularly narrative based.
sentences.chinese: 你的圖像典型的表現出特別依託於敘事體。
印度創立了敘事詩文學。

sentences.english: The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中國文學潮流遭遇了急變，白話敘事替代文言詠歎。

sentences.english: There are basically five kinds of narrative of childhood memories in novels.
sentences.chinese: 當代小說中的童年回憶敘事有五種基本形態。

sentences.english: Let us draw to a close this era of meta-narratives.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們爲“元敘事”的時代畫個句號吧。

sentences.english: Our Humble Soul shows Xiong Zhengliang's narrative features in his novels.
sentences.chinese: 《我們卑微的靈魂》顯示了熊正良的小說敘事特徵。

sentences.english: The first and longest narrative within the novel is Mattie Michael's.
sentences.chinese: 第一次和最長的敘事的小說是男孩邁克爾。

sentences.english: Honigman said it is an experiment in crowdsourced storytelling.
sentences.chinese: Honigman說，這是協作敘事的一個實驗。

sentences.english: Mr Penn is much better at narrative than analysis.
sentences.chinese: 佩恩的敘事比分析更精彩。

definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
